column5: The MSc in Entrepreneurship at the University of Leicester is for those with an entrepreneurial or innovative mind who would like to learn how to manage innovative ideas, either within organisations or as an entrepreneur. The course will teach students main theories, models, frameworks and techniques of entrepreneurship including tools from strategy, marketing and business plans. Students will also develop skills in analytical reasoning, interpersonal communication, team-working, and more. After completing the program graduates will be prepared for a wide range of entrepreneurial roles including innovation management, venture capital activities, and consulting.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
